CustomField.formula: If( ISNULL(Commencement_Date__c), ADDMONTHS( DATE(YEAR(ADDMONTHS(Installation_Date__c,1)),MONTH(ADDMONTHS(Installation_Date__c,1)),01) ,Term_of_Agreement_in_Months_Number__c), ADDMONTHS( Commencement_Date__c , Term_of_Agreement_in_Months_Number__c ))
CustomField.label: Contract End Date
